title: 103_hr2207
content: Common Sense Amendments for All Endangered Species Act - Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 with respect to: (1) wildlife management effects evaluation, (2) fish and wildlife conservation and management projects, (3) sport hunting, (4) foreign laws. And (5) subspecies and population criteria. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a specified funding augmentation study.
